item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea eye Forest's England U21 star McAtee
item.description: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca wants to be reunited with former Manchester City midfielder James McAtee. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Transfer window preview: What do Europe's big clubs need?
item.description: The window opens across Europe in January, so what are the top teams planning?

item.title: Ravens' Derrick Henry rushes for 216 yards in win over Packers
Henry up to 10th all time in rushing, Ravens win
item.description: Baltimore running back Derrick Henry moved into 10th place all time in NFL rushing yards Saturday night, finishing with 216, to go along with four tou...

item.title: Bears clinch North title with GB loss; 1st since '18
item.description: The Chicago Bears locked up the NFC North on Saturday night at the conclusion of Green Bay's 41-24 loss to Baltimore.
